name: speakerphone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a phone that you can use without having to hold any part of it in your hand and that allows other people to hear the person you are talking to: She called into the meeting via speakerphone. "Her blood test is negative," said the voice on the speaker phone. on speakerphone
using the function of a phone that allows other people to hear the person you are talking to: Every time I call him he puts me on speakerphone. Thompson takes her call, on speakerphone. They listened on speaker phone to what they thought was a call from the bank. Synonym
on speaker
More examplesFewer examplesDrivers can make calls using hands-free technology, such as speakerphones or ear-piece microphones.He put his hands flat on the table and bent over the speakerphone as if he was going to smash it.Brian did not attend Friday's court session and instead listened on a speaker phone.
